What Dadge Says: Combination Ratings
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Breeding/Combining: What Dadge Says: Combination Ratings
By Kurasu Soratobu on Sunday, January 20, 2002 - 07:26 am:

UPDATE: I tested out the combinations, and discovered just how Dadge actually rates them. As has been suspected, he rates by the stats, and techs have nothing to do with it.

After applying the 'corrections' (see Dark Phoenix's post: 'Correcting and Combining, a hypothesis' in the Breeding/Combining section):

No stats match/The monsters are an identical breed AND subtype (I.E. two Golem/Golem, or two Suezo/Zuum, etc.): 'This one's all up to you'

One stat matches: 'The prospect is unsure'

Two stats match: 'This combination doesn't look so good, I can't recommend it'

Three stats match: 'The prospect is fine... It will probably work out'

Four stats match: 'The prospect of this combination is good. You can look forward to it.'

All six stats match: 'The prospect of this combination is great. It can't go wrong unless something weird happens.'


THANKS TO RNA: For giving the first draft of this information.
